shortDefinitions: organized, arranged, or dealt with satisfactorily

definitions: (of a person) confident, organized, and emotionally well balanced

examples.text: a pretty sorted kind of fellow

shortDefinitions: confident, organized, and emotionally well balanced

definitions: (of a person) prepared for or provided with something (especially illegal drugs)

examples.text: Are you sorted? This is good stuff—it'll keep you going all night

shortDefinitions: (of person) prepared for or provided with something
